description: An illustration of two warning road signs attached to the top of a pole: the top sign is a yellow diamond with a thick black border within and an illustration of a kangaroo seen in profile from the right side in the center, while the bottom sign is a yellow rectangle with a thick black border within and the letters "XING" in all capitals in the center ("XING" being a shortened way to say crossing, implying that kangaroos and other wildlife typically cross at this point of the road.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
